name: Alone (itch) (Hans Meulblok)
description:
I had some spare time so I decided to give myself 1 week to create a horror type game. I had never created something like this. It was a fun experience and I recorded the process of me making it. You can find the devlog covering it on my Youtube channel.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2tf4-r_8nAp0OetL3NSeyw/video
